usercssData.name: Stylish Dark Menu
usercssData.author: drunkguard
usercssData.description:
Does one job: makes your Stylish popup menu dark. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
This style doesn't work on Firefox because of Firefox API changes recently.
